CodeRibbon

CodeRibbon is an Atom plugin to assist developers in managing and navigating open code documents.

It does so by providing a configurable grid of code documents that can move left/right on a ribbon.

Features

  • Replaces tab documents
  • Configurable grid... 2x1, 2x2, 3x2, etc.
  • Quickly move the ribbon to reveal recent documents
  • Efficiently go fullscreen on a single document
  • Zoom out to view all open code documents

This is a research project at the University of Tennessee by Dr. Austin Henley's software engineering research group.

The Plugin and Source Code are both available.

Plugin Source Code

Contact: azh@utk.edu
